The question asks how many times the camera focuses on the front of the surfboard throughout the video, and with only one instance observed, we need to consider the options. Option C ("Two times") and Option D ("Three times") are not yet supported by the evidence. Option A ("Five times") and Option B ("Four times") are also not supported.
